## Checklist

### Responsiveness
- [ ] Verified in Mobile
- [ ] Verified in Tablet
- [ ] Verified in Desktop

### Browser Support
- [ ] Verified in Firefox
- [ ] Verified in Chrome
- [ ] Independent of browser

### Responsabilities
- [ ] This breaks no tests
- [ ] This doesn't trigger any warnings
